trans-unit.resname: The Best of LMMS vol. VI
trans-unit.source: The Best of LMMS vol. VI

trans-unit.resname:
#### The competition has ended on **April 2nd, 2019**. Support LMMS and buy the compilation over at our [bandcamp page.](https://lmms.bandcamp.com/album/the-best-of-lmms-vol-6)
Listen to all entries [here.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/u/1/d/e/2PACX-1vQm-kulIpC2Na8ol7brGGmmK3aK4kz9AaUi0KIy1FrHUj6snVwCpdcDZqJ7unf_oIbGTmC4cWnP1tLW/pubhtml?gid=1466576535&single=true)
Winners: <iframe width="100%" height="350" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" allow="autoplay" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/768817671&color=%23ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&show_teaser=true"></iframe>
#### Original description: We are proud to present to you The Best of LMMS contest volume 6! The contest aims to inspire the community to create and share their music. Submit your track at the link below before midnight (23:59.59 UTC Time) on April 2nd for a chance to be featured on the BoL v6 album. The compilation will be uploaded to Bandcamp, with all profits going towards LMMS' further development.
[Submit here](https://goo.gl/forms/lNmexmoqWiwiKDUf1) #### Competition rules: 1. **The Deadline:** - Track must be submitted by April 2nd 2019 at 23:59.59 UTC using [this form](https://goo.gl/forms/lNmexmoqWiwiKDUf1). 2. **The Track:** - Must be produced in LMMS. - You may use other programs for mastering and post processing. - Must be under 10 minutes long. - No winning tracks from previous Best of LMMS albums allowed. - No remixes allowed. 3. **The Submissions:** - You must submit using this form only. - No more than ONE entry per artist is allowed. - Collaborations count as ONE entry for each artist involved. - No collaborating with judges on entries. - Only submissions hosted on Soundcloud, YouTube, or Clyp are allowed. - The full track should be available at the submission link provided - Your entry must be available for listening until the end of the judging process. If not, your entry will be disqualified. 4. **The Judges:** -The jury consists of: Abludo, Dystany, Heavenity Princess, Jacoby Davis, Pyrif, and Spekular. 5. **The Judging:** - After the deadline, the judges will make their decisions and release the results within 14 days. 6. **Release:** - The 25 highest scoring songs will be released as an album on Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love.
trans-unit.source:

trans-unit.resname:
#### The competition has ended on **April 16th, 2018**. Support LMMS and buy the compilation over at our [bandcamp page.](https://lmms.bandcamp.com/album/the-best-of-lmms-vol-5)
Listen to all entries [here.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vQOjvIBp40ez-2QrPsGHt_LGY2XejaOFZrXWsgPVPXoH7w7QQriUV52_OeCQBL9tcOPlCxdUw2HC6Ud/pubhtml?gid=1958072675&single=true)
Winners: <iframe width="100%" height="350" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" allow="autoplay" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/519667455&color=%23ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&show_teaser=true"></iframe>
#### Original description: We are proud to present to you The Best of LMMS contest volume 5! The contest aims to inspire the community to create and share their music. Submit your track at the link below before midnight (23:59.59) on April 16th (UTC time) for a chance to be featured on the BoL v5 album. The compilation will be uploaded to Bandcamp, with all profits going towards LMMS' further development.
[Submit here](https://goo.gl/47ZXq1) #### Competition rules: 1. **The Deadline:** - Track must be submitted by April 16th 2018 at 23:59.59 UTC using [this form](https://goo.gl/47ZXq1). 2. **The Track:** - Must be produced in LMMS. - You may use other programs for mastering and post processing. - Must be under 10 minutes long. - No winning tracks from previous Best of LMMS albums allowed. - No remixes allowed. 3. **The Submissions:** - You must submit using this form only. - No more than ONE entry per artist is allowed.* - Collaborations count as ONE entry for each artist involved.* - No collaborating with judges on entries. - Only submissions hosted on Soundcloud, YouTube, or Clyp are allowed. - Your entry must be available for listening until the end of the judging process. If not, your entry will be disqualified. 4. **The Judges:** -The jury consists of: Dull Machine, Etorna_Z, Jernemies, Poleroyd, Umcaruje and Unfa. 5. **The Judging:** - After the deadline, the judges will score each track and release the results within 14 days. 6. **Release:** - The 25 highest scoring songs will be released as an album on Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love.
\* *This year the judging process has changed, to ensure fairer handling of entries. The change to one submission only is to allow each and every entry to be fully scored by the panel of judges. This was previously handled by a preliminary screening round to help cut down the large amount of entries received. By lowering the amount of up-front entries allowed, the judges will have the time to fully score each track entered.*

Listen to all entries [here.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1pPoM7CQIg5C4uzgOrlRnytJiAsOD5K6jxitF-SIjXRQ/pubhtml?gid=975440614&single=true)
Winners: <iframe width="100%" height="350" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/321234884&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false"></iframe> #### Original Description: We are proud to present to you The Best of LMMS contest volume 4! The contest aims to inspire the community to create and share their music. Submit your track at the link below before midnight (23:59.59) on April 16th (UTC time) for a chance to be featured on the BoL v4 album. The compilation will be uploaded to Bandcamp, with all profits going towards LMMS' further development. This year's submissions are handled through Google forms. We accept submissions hosted on YouTube, Soundcloud and Clyp. For the full rules check out the submission form: https://goo.gl/forms/cifEliOViOXTSc8H2 #### Competition rules: 1. **The Deadline** - Tracks must be submitted by April 16th at 23:59.59 UTC using [this form](https://goo.gl/forms/cifEliOViOXTSc8H2). 2. **The Tracks** - Must be produced in LMMS. - You may use other programs for mastering and post processing. - Must be under 10 minutes long. - No winning tracks from previous Best of LMMS albums allowed. - No remixes allowed. 3. **The Submissions** - You must submit using this form only. - No more than **TWO** entries per artist are allowed. - Collaborations count as **ONE** entry for each artist involved. - Only submissions hosted on Soundcloud, YouTube or Clyp are allowed. - Your entry must be available for listening until the end of the judging process. If not, your entry will be disqualified. 4. **The Judges** - The jury consists of: Greippi, Jacoby Davis, Spekular, Stakeout Punch and Squatro. 5. **The Judging Process** - After the deadline, the judges will make their decisions and release the results within 14 days. 6. **The Release** - The 25 highest scoring songs will be released as an album on Bandcamp with the price of "Pay what you want". All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love.

trans-unit.target:
#### Kompetisi ini telah berakhir pada **16 April, 2017**. Dukung LMMS beli kompilasinya di [laman bandcamp.](https://lmms.bandcamp.com/album/the-best-of-lmms-vol-4)
Dengarkan semua entri [disini.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1pPoM7CQIg5C4uzgOrlRnytJiAsOD5K6jxitF-SIjXRQ/pubhtml?gid=975440614&single=true)
Pemenang: <iframe width="100%" height="350" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/321234884&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false"></iframe> #### Deskripsi Asli: Dengan bangga kami mempersembahkan kontes Yang terbaik dari LMMS volume 4! Kontes ini bertujuan untuk menginspirasi komunitas untuk membuat dan berbagi musik mereka. Kirimkan lagu Anda di tautan di bawah ini sebelum tengah malam (23.59.59) pada tanggal 16 April (waktu UTC) untuk kesempatan tampil di album YTDL v4. Kompilasi akan diunggah ke Bandcamp, dengan semua keuntungan ditujukan untuk pengembangan LMMS lebih lanjut. Pengajuan tahun ini ditangani melalui formulir Google. Kami menerima pengajuan yang dihosting di YouTube, Soundcloud dan Clyp. Untuk aturan lengkap, lihat formulir pengajuan: https://goo.gl/forms/cifEliOViOXTSc8H2 #### Aturan kompetisi: 1. **Batas waktu** - Trek harus diserahkan pada tanggal 16 April di 23.59.59 UTC menggunakan [formulir ini](https://goo.gl/forms/cifEliOViOXTSc8H2). 2. **Syarat & Ketentuan** - Harus diproduksi menggunakan LMMS. - Anda bisa menggunakan program lain untuk mastering dan post-processing. - Panjang harus dibawah 10 menit. - Tidak diizinkan menggunakan trek yang sudah dimenangkan dari kompetisi sebelumnya. - Tidak diizinkan untuk melakukan remix. 3. **Pendaftaran** - Anda harus mengirimkan hanya menggunakan formulir ini. - Tidak diizinkan lebih dari **DUA** entri per artis. - Kolaborasi dihitung sebagai **SATU** entri untuk setiap artis yang terlibat. - Pengajuan hanya diizinkan melalui hosting Soundcloud, YouTube atau Clyp. - Entri Anda harus tersedia untuk didengarkan sampai akhir proses penjurian. Jika tidak, entri Anda akan didiskualifikasi. 4. **Para juri** - Juri terdiri dari: Greippi, Jacoby Davis, Spekuler, Stakeout Punch dan Squatro. 5. **Proses penilaian** - Setelah tenggat waktu, juri akan mengambil keputusan dan melepaskan hasilnya dalam waktu 14 hari. 6. **Perilisan** - 25 lagu dengan nilai tertinggi akan dirilis sebagai album di Bandcamp dengan harga "Bayar berapapun yang Anda inginkan". Semua dana yang diterima akan disumbangkan untuk pengembangan LMMS lebih lanjut, program yang kita cintai.

trans-unit.resname: The Best of LMMS vol. III
trans-unit.source: The Best of LMMS vol. III
trans-unit.target: Yang terbaik dari LMMS vol. III

trans-unit.resname:
#### The competition has ended on **March 16th, 2016.** Support LMMS and buy the compilation over at our [bandcamp page.](https://lmms.bandcamp.com/)
Listen to all entries [here.](https://soundcloud.com/groups/the-best-of-lmms-competition-v3)
Winners: <iframe width="100%" height="450" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/211975750&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false"></iframe> #### Original description:
It’s that time of the year again: If you have made amazing tracks with LMMS we have a contest for you! The Best of LMMS contest is back! The compilation aims to inspire new users and everyone to create music. The compilation will be uploaded to Bandcamp and all profit will be donated for the further development of LMMS. Submit your track before midnight on March 16th (UTC time), and find details about the contest on the [soundcloud group.](https://soundcloud.com/groups/the-best-of-lmms-competition-v3)
#### Competition rules:
1. The Deadline. The tracks must be submitted by March 16th 0:00 UTC. The tracks can be of any genre, preferably under 10 minutes. The track must be produced in LMMS, but it is allowed to use some other software (Audacity, Ardour etc.) for post mixing/mastering. 2. The tracks. All submissions will be handled via SoundCloud using the dedicated group. You can submit a maximum of two tracks. You may submit previously released tracks, but not tracks that were in the previous Best of LMMS albums. Remixes are not allowed. A collaboration between a judge and yourself is not allowed. 3. The Judges. The jury consists of: Zach Henderson, Second Flight, Umcaruje, Greippi, Tres Finnochiaro, Abludo. 4. The Judging Process. After the deadline, the judges will make their decisions and release the results within next 14 days. 5. Release. The compilation will be released on a dedicated LMMS artists Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love.
trans-unit.source:

trans-unit.target:
#### Kompetisi ini telah berakhir pada **16 Maret, 2016.** Dukung LMMS dan beli kompilasinya di [laman bandcamp.](https://lmms.bandcamp.com/)
Dengarkan semua entri [disini.](https://soundcloud.com/groups/the-best-of-lmms-competition-v3)
Pemenang: <iframe width="100%" height="450" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/211975750&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false"></iframe> #### Deskripsi asli:
Tahun ini sudah waktunya lagi: Jika Anda telah membuat trek yang menakjubkan dengan LMMS, kami memiliki sebuah kontes untuk Anda! kontes Yang Terbaik dari LMMS telah kembali! Kompilasi ini bertujuan untuk menginspirasi pengguna baru dan setiap orang untuk menciptakan musik. Kompilasi akan diunggah ke Bandcamp dan semua keuntungan akan disumbangkan untuk pengembangan LMMS lebih lanjut. Kirimkan lagu Anda sebelum tengah malam pada tanggal 16 Maret (waktu UTC), dan temukan rincian tentang kontes di [grup soundcloud].(https://soundcloud.com/groups/the-best-of-lmms-competition-v3)
#### Peraturan kompetisi:
1. Batas waktu. Trek harus diserahkan pada 16 Maret 0:00 UTC. Trek bisa berupa genre apapun, sebaiknya di bawah 10 menit. Trek harus diproduksi di LMMS, namun diperbolehkan untuk menggunakan beberapa perangkat lunak lain (Audacity, Ardor dll.) Untuk mixing / mastering. 2. Trek. Semua pengajuan akan ditangani melalui SoundCloud menggunakan grup khusus. Anda bisa mengirimkan maksimal dua lagu. Anda bisa mengirimkan lagu yang dirilis sebelumnya, tapi bukan lagu yang ada di album LMMS sebelumnya. Remix tidak diijinkan, Kolaborasi antara juri dan diri sendiri tidak diperbolehkan. 3. Para juri. Juri terdiri dari: Zach Henderson, Second Flight, Umcaruje, Greippi, Tres Finnochiaro, Abludo. 4. Proses Peninjauan. Setelah batas waktu, Hakim akan membuat keputusan dan melepaskan hasilnya dalam 14 hari ke depan. 5. Pelepasan. Kompilasi tersebut akan dirilis pada Bandcamp artis LMMS khusus dengan harga "Bayar berapapun yang Anda inginkan". Semua dana yang diterima Akan disumbangkan untuk pengembangan lebih lanjut dari LMMS, program yang kita cintai.

trans-unit.source: The Best of LMMS vol. II

trans-unit.resname:
#### The competition has ended on **April 1st, 2015.**
Support LMMS and buy the compilation over at our [bandcamp page.](https://lmms.bandcamp.com/)
Listen to all entries [here.](https://soundcloud.com/groups/the-best-of-lmms-competition-v2)
Winners: <iframe width="100%" height="350" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/103762698&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false"></iframe> #### Original description: 1. The Deadline. The songs must be submitted by April 1st 0:00 UTC. The songs can be of any genre, preferably under 10 minutes. The song should be made mostly in LMMS, but it is allowed to use some other software (Audacity, Ardour etc.) for post mixing/mastering. 2. The songs. All submissions will be handled via SoundCloud using the dedicated group. A user can submit a maximum of two songs. Users CAN submit previously released songs, BUT not songs submitted for previous BoL competitions. Remixes are not allowed. A song cooperation between a judge and yourself is not allowed. 3. The Judges and the Release. The judges consist of Stian Jørgensrud (Sti-Jay), Ian Letarte, Hashhakaj kamaluden, Fastigium, artlu, TRonix and Jernemies. The compilation will be released on the dedicated LMMS artists Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS or to cover other program related costs.
Extras:
By marking your song with the tag "Want Feedback" you can get feedback from the judges. Comments from different judges will be combined into one text so you won't know from who or how many the feedback is. Note that you aren't guaranteed any feedback, it depends on how much time the judges have. Also note that the judges are just regular LMMS artists and no matter what feedback you get the judges' decision for album songs is final.

trans-unit.target:
#### Kompetisi ini telah berakhir pada ** 1 April, 2015.**
Dukung LMMS dan beli kompilasinya di [laman bandcamp.](https://lmms.bandcamp.com/)
Dengarkan semua entri [disini.](https://soundcloud.com/groups/the-best-of-lmms-competition-v2)
Pemenang: <iframe width="100%" height="350" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/103762698&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false"></iframe> #### Deskripsi asli: 1. Batas waktu. Lagu tersebut harus diserahkan pada tanggal 1 April 0:00 UTC. Lagunya bisa berupa genre apapun, sebaiknya di bawah 10 menit. Lagu tersebut harus dibuat sebagian besar di LMMS, namun diperbolehkan untuk menggunakan beberapa perangkat lunak lain (Audacity, Ardor dll.) Untuk pasca mixing / mastering. 2. Lagunya. Semua pengajuan akan ditangani melalui SoundCloud menggunakan grup khusus. Pengguna bisa mengirimkan maksimal dua lagu. Pengguna DAPAT mengirimkan lagu yang dirilis sebelumnya, NAMUN bukan lagu yang diserahkan untuk kompetisi YTdL sebelumnya. Remix tidak diijinkan. Sebuah kerjasama lagu antara juri dan diri sendiri tidak diperbolehkan. 3. Para juri dan Rilisnya. Para juri terdiri dari Stian Jørgensrud (Sti-Jay), Ian Letarte, Hashhakaj kamaluden, Fastigium, artlu, TRonix and Jernemies. Kompilasi akan dirilis pada artis Bandcamp LMMS khusus dengan harga “Pay what you want”. Semua dana yang diterima akan didonasikan untuk pengembangan LMMS lebih lanjut Atau untuk menutupi biaya terkait program lainnya.
Tambahan:
Dengan menandai lagu Anda dengan tag "Want Feedback" Anda bisa mendapatkan umpan balik dari para juri. Komentar dari juri yang berbeda akan digabungkan menjadi satu Teks sehingga Anda tidak akan tahu dari siapa atau berapa banyak umpan baliknya. Perhatikan bahwa Anda tidak dijamin mendapat umpan balik, itu tergantung pada berapa banyak waktu yang dimiliki juri. Perhatikan juga bahwa para juri hanya seniman LMMS biasa dan tidak peduli tanggapan apa yang Anda dapatkan dari keputusan juri untuk lagu album adalah keputusan akhir.

trans-unit.resname:
#### The competition has ended on **February 15th, 2014.**
Support LMMS and buy the compilation over at our [bandcamp page.](https://lmms.bandcamp.com/)
Listen to all entries [here.](https://soundcloud.com/groups/lmms-top-songs-compilation)
Winners: <iframe width="100%" height="350" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/27083727&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false"></iframe> #### Original description:
If you have made amazing songs with LMMS we have a contest for you! A LMMS top songs contest. The compilation aims to inspire new users and get new producers to use the program as well as to give a big thank you to LMMS developers. The compilation will be uploaded to Bandcamp and all profit will be donated for the further development of LMMS. Submit your song before midnight on February 15th, and find details about this contest on the Soundcloud site.
#### Competition rules: 1. The Deadline. The songs must be submitted by February 15th 12 PM GMT. A user can submit a maximum of two songs. The songs can be of any genre, preferably under 10 minutes. All submissions will be handled via SoundCloud using the dedicated group. User CAN submit previously released songs. Remixes are not allowed. The song should be made mostly in LMMS, but it is allowed to use some other software (Audacity, Ardour etc.) for post mixing/mastering. 2. The Judges. The judges consist of the group Avelocity: Brian Amin (Maniarib), Joshua Wade (Second Flight), Uroš Maravić (Umcaruje), Evan Roberts (Stakeout Punch), Joshua Flynn (Raptor980), Jan Heemstra (Combustible Lemonade) 3. The Judging Process. After the deadline, the judges will make their decisions and release the results within next 7 days. 4. Release. The compilation will be released on a dedicated LMMS artists Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love.
trans-unit.source:

#### Kompetisi ini telah berakhir pada **15 Februari 2014.**
Dukung LMMS dan beli kompilasinya di [laman bandcamp.](https://lmms.bandcamp.com/)
Dengarkan semua entri [disini.](https://soundcloud.com/groups/lmms-top-songs-compilation)
Pemenang: <iframe width="100%" height="350" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/27083727&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false"></iframe> #### Deskripsi asli:
Jika Anda telah membuat lagu yang menakjubkan dengan LMMS, kami memiliki sebuah kontes untuk Anda! Lomba lagu LMMS terbaik. Kompilasi ini bertujuan untuk menginspirasi pengguna baru dan membuat produser baru untuk menggunakan program ini dan juga memberikan ucapan terima kasih yang sebesar-besarnya kepada para pengembang LMMS. Kompilasi akan diunggah ke Bandcamp dan semua keuntungan akan disumbangkan untuk pengembangan LMMS lebih lanjut. Kirimkan lagu Anda sebelum Tengah malam pada tanggal 15 Februari, dan temukan rincian tentang kontes ini di situs Soundcloud.
#### Aturan kompetisi: 1. Batas waktu. Lagu-lagu tersebut harus diserahkan pada 15 Februari 12:00 GMT. Pengguna bisa mengirimkan maksimal dua lagu. Lagu-lagunya bisa berupa genre apapun, Sebaiknya di bawah 10 menit. Semua pengajuan akan ditangani melalui SoundCloud menggunakan grup khusus. Pengguna BISA mengirimkan lagu yang dirilis sebelumnya. Remix tidak diijinkan. Lagu tersebut harus dibuat sebagian besar di LMMS, namun diperbolehkan untuk menggunakan beberapa perangkat lunak lain (Audacity, Ardor dll.) Untuk pasca mixing / mastering. 2. Para juri. Juri terdiri dari kelompok Avelocity: Brian Amin (Maniarib), Joshua Wade (Second Flight), Uroš Maravić (Umcaruje), Evan Roberts (Stakeout Punch), Joshua Flynn (Raptor980), Jan Heemstra (Combustible Lemonade) 3. Proses Peninjauan. Setelah tenggat waktu, juri akan mengambil keputusan dan melepaskan hasilnya dalam 7 hari ke depan. 4. Rilisnya. Kompilasi tersebut akan dirilis pada Bandcamp artis bandingan LMMS khusus dengan harga "Bayar berapapun yang Anda inginkan". Semua dana yang diterima Akan disumbangkan untuk pengembangan lebih lanjut dari LMMS, program yang kita cintai.

trans-unit.resname: Get Involved
trans-unit.source: Get Involved

trans-unit.resname: LMMS is a free, open-source software built entirely by a small number of volunteers in their free time. But to keep the project going, we need this number to grow. So if you feel like giving something back to the community, join us in making LMMS better!
trans-unit.source: LMMS is a free, open-source software built entirely by a small number of volunteers in their free time. But to keep the project going, we need this number to grow. So if you feel like giving something back to the community, join us in making LMMS better!
trans-unit.target: LMMS adalah perangkat lunak open source gratis yang seluruhnya dibangun oleh sejumlah kecil relawan di waktu senggang mereka. Tapi untuk menjaga agar proyek tetap berjalan, kami memerlukan jumlah ini untuk tumbuh. Jadi jika Anda merasa ingin memberikan sesuatu kepada komunitas ini, bergabunglah dengan kami untuk membuat LMMS menjadi lebih baik!

trans-unit.resname: What you can do
trans-unit.source: What you can do

trans-unit.resname: There are multiple ways of contributing:
trans-unit.source: There are multiple ways of contributing:

trans-unit.resname: Join Development
trans-unit.source: Join Development

trans-unit.resname: We are in desperate need of new developers to join our team. LMMS is written in C++ using the Qt Framework, so if you know a thing or two about these, don't hesitate to get yourself dirty with coding!
trans-unit.source: We are in desperate need of new developers to join our team. LMMS is written in C++ using the Qt Framework, so if you know a thing or two about these, don't hesitate to get yourself dirty with coding!
trans-unit.target: Kami sangat membutuhkan pengembang baru untuk bergabung dengan tim kami. LMMS ditulis dalam C ++ menggunakan Framework Qt , Jadi jika Anda tahu satu atau dua hal tentang ini, jangan ragu untuk membuat diri Anda kotor dengan coding!

trans-unit.resname: See our GitHub Wiki and our bug tracker to get started. Furthermore, the LMMS mailing list is a great place to introduce yourself.
trans-unit.source: See our GitHub Wiki and our bug tracker to get started. Furthermore, the LMMS mailing list is a great place to introduce yourself.
trans-unit.target: Lihat Wiki GitHub kami dan pelacak bug kami untuk memulai. Selanjutnya, Milis LMMS adalah tempat terbaik untuk memperkenalkan diri Anda.

trans-unit.resname: Website & Docs
trans-unit.source: Website & Docs

trans-unit.resname: You can help us by improving this website or documenting the software. The website sources are in our GitHub repo LMMS/lmms.io, our documentation is hosted using a MediaWiki instance.
trans-unit.source: You can help us by improving this website or documenting the software. The website sources are in our GitHub repo LMMS/lmms.io, our documentation is hosted using a MediaWiki instance.
trans-unit.target: Anda dapat membantu kami dengan memperbaiki situs ini atau mendokumentasikan perangkat lunak. Sumber situs web kami berada di repo GitHub LMMS/lmms.io, dokumentasi kami dihosting menggunakan Contoh MediaWiki.

trans-unit.resname: Public registration on our Wiki is disabled due to spam issues. Please post to the mailing list if you're interested in helping out with the documentation!
trans-unit.source: Public registration on our Wiki is disabled due to spam issues. Please post to the mailing list if you're interested in helping out with the documentation!
trans-unit.target: Pendaftaran publik pada Wiki kami dinonaktifkan untuk menghindari isu spam. Silakan posting ke milis jika Anda tertarik untuk membantu bagian dokumentasi!

trans-unit.source: Donate

trans-unit.resname: Even though donations are not the thing we need the most (that'd be developers), they help us pay our bills, for our domain lmms.io for instance.
trans-unit.source: Even though donations are not the thing we need the most (that'd be developers), they help us pay our bills, for our domain lmms.io for instance.
trans-unit.target: Walaupun donasi tersebut bukanlah hal yang sangat kami butuhkan (untuk developer), namun hal tersebut membantu kami membayar tagihan kami, misalnya untuk domain kami lmms.io.

trans-unit.resname: Donate via PayPal
trans-unit.source: Donate via PayPal
Translations

trans-unit.resname: If your language is missing in LMMS, help the project and other users speaking the same language by translating the software. You can find instructions on the page "Creating a localization" in our GitHub Wiki.
trans-unit.source: If your language is missing in LMMS, help the project and other users speaking the same language by translating the software. You can find instructions on the page "Creating a localization" in our GitHub Wiki.
trans-unit.target: Jika bahasa anda tidak ada di LMMS, bantulah proyek ini dan pengguna lain yang menggunakan bahasa yang sama dengan menterjemahkan perangkat lunak ini. Anda bisa mencari instruksi di laman "Membuat lokalisasi" di Wiki GitHub kami.

trans-unit.resname:
#### The competition has ended on **April 2nd, 2019**. Support LMMS and buy the compilation over at our [bandcamp page.](https://lmms.bandcamp.com/album/the-best-of-lmms-vol-6)
Listen to all entries [here.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/u/1/d/e/2PACX-1vQm-kulIpC2Na8ol7brGGmmK3aK4kz9AaUi0KIy1FrHUj6snVwCpdcDZqJ7unf_oIbGTmC4cWnP1tLW/pubhtml?gid=1466576535&single=true)
Winners: <iframe width="100%%" height="350" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" allow="autoplay" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/768817671&color=%23ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&show_teaser=true"></iframe>
#### Original description: We are proud to present to you The Best of LMMS contest volume 6! The contest aims to inspire the community to create and share their music. Submit your track at the link below before midnight (23:59.59 UTC Time) on April 2nd for a chance to be featured on the BoL v6 album. The compilation will be uploaded to Bandcamp, with all profits going towards LMMS' further development.
[Submit here](https://goo.gl/forms/lNmexmoqWiwiKDUf1) #### Competition rules: 1. **The Deadline:** - Track must be submitted by April 2nd 2019 at 23:59.59 UTC using [this form](https://goo.gl/forms/lNmexmoqWiwiKDUf1). 2. **The Track:** - Must be produced in LMMS. - You may use other programs for mastering and post processing. - Must be under 10 minutes long. - No winning tracks from previous Best of LMMS albums allowed. - No remixes allowed. 3. **The Submissions:** - You must submit using this form only. - No more than ONE entry per artist is allowed. - Collaborations count as ONE entry for each artist involved. - No collaborating with judges on entries. - Only submissions hosted on Soundcloud, YouTube, or Clyp are allowed. - The full track should be available at the submission link provided - Your entry must be available for listening until the end of the judging process. If not, your entry will be disqualified. 4. **The Judges:** -The jury consists of: Abludo, Dystany, Heavenity Princess, Jacoby Davis, Pyrif, and Spekular. 5. **The Judging:** - After the deadline, the judges will make their decisions and release the results within 14 days. 6. **Release:** - The 25 highest scoring songs will be released as an album on Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love.
trans-unit.source:

#### The competition has ended on **April 16th, 2018**. Support LMMS and buy the compilation over at our [bandcamp page.](https://lmms.bandcamp.com/album/the-best-of-lmms-vol-5)
Listen to all entries [here.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vQOjvIBp40ez-2QrPsGHt_LGY2XejaOFZrXWsgPVPXoH7w7QQriUV52_OeCQBL9tcOPlCxdUw2HC6Ud/pubhtml?gid=1958072675&single=true)
Winners: <iframe width="100%%" height="350" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" allow="autoplay" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/519667455&color=%23ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&show_teaser=true"></iframe>
#### Original description: We are proud to present to you The Best of LMMS contest volume 5! The contest aims to inspire the community to create and share their music. Submit your track at the link below before midnight (23:59.59) on April 16th (UTC time) for a chance to be featured on the BoL v5 album. The compilation will be uploaded to Bandcamp, with all profits going towards LMMS' further development.
[Submit here](https://goo.gl/47ZXq1) #### Competition rules: 1. **The Deadline:** - Track must be submitted by April 16th 2018 at 23:59.59 UTC using [this form](https://goo.gl/47ZXq1). 2. **The Track:** - Must be produced in LMMS. - You may use other programs for mastering and post processing. - Must be under 10 minutes long. - No winning tracks from previous Best of LMMS albums allowed. - No remixes allowed. 3. **The Submissions:** - You must submit using this form only. - No more than ONE entry per artist is allowed.* - Collaborations count as ONE entry for each artist involved.* - No collaborating with judges on entries. - Only submissions hosted on Soundcloud, YouTube, or Clyp are allowed. - Your entry must be available for listening until the end of the judging process. If not, your entry will be disqualified. 4. **The Judges:** -The jury consists of: Dull Machine, Etorna_Z, Jernemies, Poleroyd, Umcaruje and Unfa. 5. **The Judging:** - After the deadline, the judges will score each track and release the results within 14 days. 6. **Release:** - The 25 highest scoring songs will be released as an album on Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love.
\* *This year the judging process has changed, to ensure fairer handling of entries. The change to one submission only is to allow each and every entry to be fully scored by the panel of judges. This was previously handled by a preliminary screening round to help cut down the large amount of entries received. By lowering the amount of up-front entries allowed, the judges will have the time to fully score each track entered.*
trans-unit.source:

[Submit here](https://goo.gl/47ZXq1) #### Competition rules: 1. **The Deadline:** - Track must be submitted by April 16th 2018 at 23:59.59 UTC using [this form](https://goo.gl/47ZXq1). 2. **The Track:** - Must be produced in LMMS. - You may use other programs for mastering and post processing. - Must be under 10 minutes long. - No winning tracks from previous Best of LMMS albums allowed. - No remixes allowed. 3. **The Submissions:** - You must submit using this form only. - No more than ONE entry per artist is allowed.* - Collaborations count as ONE entry for each artist involved.* - No collaborating with judges on entries. - Only submissions hosted on Soundcloud, YouTube, or Clyp are allowed. - Your entry must be available for listening until the end of the judging process. If not, your entry will be disqualified. 4. **The Judges:** -The jury consists of: Dull Machine, Etorna_Z, Jernemies, Poleroyd, Umcaruje and Unfa. 5. **The Judging:** - After the deadline, the judges will score each track and release the results within 14 days. 6. **Release:** - The 25 highest scoring songs will be released as an album on Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love.
\* *This year the judging process has changed, to ensure fairer handling of entries. The change to one submission only is to allow each and every entry to be fully scored by the panel of judges. This was previously handled by a preliminary screening round to help cut down the large amount of entries received. By lowering the amount of up-front entries allowed, the judges will have the time to fully score each track entered.*

#### The competition has ended on **March 16th, 2016.** Support LMMS and buy the compilation over at our [bandcamp page.](https://lmms.bandcamp.com/)
Listen to all entries [here.](https://soundcloud.com/groups/the-best-of-lmms-competition-v3)
Winners: <iframe width="100%%" height="450" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/211975750&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false"></iframe> #### Original description:
It’s that time of the year again: If you have made amazing tracks with LMMS we have a contest for you! The Best of LMMS contest is back! The compilation aims to inspire new users and everyone to create music. The compilation will be uploaded to Bandcamp and all profit will be donated for the further development of LMMS. Submit your track before midnight on March 16th (UTC time), and find details about the contest on the [soundcloud group.](https://soundcloud.com/groups/the-best-of-lmms-competition-v3)
#### Competition rules:
1. The Deadline. The tracks must be submitted by March 16th 0:00 UTC. The tracks can be of any genre, preferably under 10 minutes. The track must be produced in LMMS, but it is allowed to use some other software (Audacity, Ardour etc.) for post mixing/mastering. 2. The tracks. All submissions will be handled via SoundCloud using the dedicated group. You can submit a maximum of two tracks. You may submit previously released tracks, but not tracks that were in the previous Best of LMMS albums. Remixes are not allowed. A collaboration between a judge and yourself is not allowed. 3. The Judges. The jury consists of: Zach Henderson, Second Flight, Umcaruje, Greippi, Tres Finnochiaro, Abludo. 4. The Judging Process. After the deadline, the judges will make their decisions and release the results within next 14 days. 5. Release. The compilation will be released on a dedicated LMMS artists Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love.

trans-unit.resname:
#### The competition has ended on **April 1st, 2015.**
Support LMMS and buy the compilation over at our [bandcamp page.](https://lmms.bandcamp.com/)
Listen to all entries [here.](https://soundcloud.com/groups/the-best-of-lmms-competition-v2)
Winners: <iframe width="100%%" height="350" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/103762698&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false"></iframe> #### Original description: 1. The Deadline. The songs must be submitted by April 1st 0:00 UTC. The songs can be of any genre, preferably under 10 minutes. The song should be made mostly in LMMS, but it is allowed to use some other software (Audacity, Ardour etc.) for post mixing/mastering. 2. The songs. All submissions will be handled via SoundCloud using the dedicated group. A user can submit a maximum of two songs. Users CAN submit previously released songs, BUT not songs submitted for previous BoL competitions. Remixes are not allowed. A song cooperation between a judge and yourself is not allowed. 3. The Judges and the Release. The judges consist of Stian Jørgensrud (Sti-Jay), Ian Letarte, Hashhakaj kamaluden, Fastigium, artlu, TRonix and Jernemies. The compilation will be released on the dedicated LMMS artists Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS or to cover other program related costs.
Extras:
By marking your song with the tag "Want Feedback" you can get feedback from the judges. Comments from different judges will be combined into one text so you won't know from who or how many the feedback is. Note that you aren't guaranteed any feedback, it depends on how much time the judges have. Also note that the judges are just regular LMMS artists and no matter what feedback you get the judges' decision for album songs is final.

#### The competition has ended on **February 15th, 2014.**
Support LMMS and buy the compilation over at our [bandcamp page.](https://lmms.bandcamp.com/)
Listen to all entries [here.](https://soundcloud.com/groups/lmms-top-songs-compilation)
Winners: <iframe width="100%%" height="350" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/27083727&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false"></iframe> #### Original description:
If you have made amazing songs with LMMS we have a contest for you! A LMMS top songs contest. The compilation aims to inspire new users and get new producers to use the program as well as to give a big thank you to LMMS developers. The compilation will be uploaded to Bandcamp and all profit will be donated for the further development of LMMS. Submit your song before midnight on February 15th, and find details about this contest on the Soundcloud site.
#### Competition rules: 1. The Deadline. The songs must be submitted by February 15th 12 PM GMT. A user can submit a maximum of two songs. The songs can be of any genre, preferably under 10 minutes. All submissions will be handled via SoundCloud using the dedicated group. User CAN submit previously released songs. Remixes are not allowed. The song should be made mostly in LMMS, but it is allowed to use some other software (Audacity, Ardour etc.) for post mixing/mastering. 2. The Judges. The judges consist of the group Avelocity: Brian Amin (Maniarib), Joshua Wade (Second Flight), Uroš Maravić (Umcaruje), Evan Roberts (Stakeout Punch), Joshua Flynn (Raptor980), Jan Heemstra (Combustible Lemonade) 3. The Judging Process. After the deadline, the judges will make their decisions and release the results within next 7 days. 4. Release. The compilation will be released on a dedicated LMMS artists Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love.

trans-unit.resname:
We are proud to present to you The Best of LMMS contest volume 8! The contest aims to inspire the community to create and share their music. Submit your track at the link below before midnight (23:59.59 UTC Time) on April 5th 2021 for a chance to be featured on the BoL v8 album. The compilation will be uploaded to Bandcamp, with all profits going towards LMMS' further development.

Submit here

#### Competition rules: 1. **The Deadline:** - Track must be submitted by April 5th 2021 at 23:59.59 UTC using this form. 2. **The Track:** - Must be produced in LMMS. - You may use other programs for mastering and post processing. - Must be under 10 minutes long. - No winning tracks from previous Best of LMMS albums allowed. - No covers or remixes of other person(s) works are permitted. - Reworks of your own tracks are eligible with judge approval. 3. **The Submissions:** - You must submit using this form only. - No more than ONE entry per artist is allowed. - Collaborations count as ONE entry for each artist involved. - No collaborating with judges on entries. - Only submissions hosted on Soundcloud, YouTube, or Clyp are allowed. - The full track should be available at the submission link provided - Your entry must be available for listening until the end of the judging process. If not, your entry will be disqualified. 4. **The Judges:** - The jury consists of: Woods Alive, Hotel Zero, Jousboxx, Blageez, Noeroti, and JVSTDARE 5. **The Judging:** - After the deadline, the judges will make their decisions and release the results within 14-21 days, personal schedules permitting. 6. **Release:** - The 25 highest scoring songs will be released as an album on Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love. **Note: Entries are approved to appear on the submission list by hand, so if you don't see yours, sit tight! It might take a while.**

We are proud to present to you The Best of LMMS contest volume 9! The contest aims to inspire the community to create and share their music. Submit your track at the link below before midnight (23:59.59 UTC Time) on April 16th 2022 for a chance to be featured on the BoL v9 album. The compilation will be uploaded to Bandcamp, with all profits going towards LMMS' further development.

Submit here

#### Competition rules: 1. **The Deadline:** - Track must be submitted by April 16th 2022 at 23:59.59 UTC using this form. 2. **The Track:** - Must be produced in LMMS. - You may use other programs for mastering and post processing. - Must be under 10 minutes long. - No winning tracks from previous Best of LMMS albums allowed. - No covers or remixes of other person(s) works are permitted. - Reworks of your own tracks are eligible with judge approval. 3. **The Submissions:** - You must submit using this form only. - No more than ONE entry per artist is allowed. - Collaborations count as ONE entry for each artist involved. - No collaborating with judges on entries. - Only submissions hosted on Soundcloud or YouTube are allowed. - The full track should be available at the submission link provided - Your entry must be available for listening until the end of the judging process. If not, your entry will be disqualified. - The entry must not contain any trademarked or copyrighted material which you do not own the rights to. 4. **The Judges:** - The jury consists of: Etorna, Noeroti, Spekular, Squatro, Stakeout Punch and Umcaruje. 5. **The Judging:** - After the deadline, the judges will make their decisions and release the results within 14-21 days, personal schedules permitting. 6. **Release:** - The 25 highest scoring songs will be released as an album on Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love. **Note: Entries are approved to appear on the submission list by hand, so if you don't see yours, sit tight! It might take a while.**

All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love. **Note: Entries are approved to appear on the submission list by hand, so if you don't see yours, sit tight! It might take a while.**
